title: Today as Always!!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Kasumi-chan…. Thank you so much for today….♡<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Fufun. This much isn’t a big deal<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Kyaah! Kasumi-chan! You’re so reliable and cool!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin is cute!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>You’re so cute~~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Well, that’s about right for Kasumin. Alright then, Honoka-senpai, these are the stuff. Please accept them…. Kufufu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>O-, ooh.... These, these are…. golden…. bread rolls!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin specially picked them out from the wheat for you, Honoka-senpai. Do savor the taste while you eat~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Let’s eat together, Kasumi-chan! Thanks for the food! *munch munch*.... *munch munch*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hnn~, today’s bread is delicious as always!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hnn~, today’s bread is delicious as always!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
